about_the_game:
〇 Production Tool: "3D RPG developer BAKIN / SmileBoom"
〇 HD-2D Dungeon Exploration JRPG
〇 Strengthen your weapons and armor with obtained materials
〇 Search for and acquire hidden skills across the land to delve deeper into the world
〇 Travel through a broken world, conquer complex labyrinths, and aim for the land of ancient legends

To fulfill a promise made long ago, a young woman becomes a novice explorer. Wishing to know every corner of this world and to become stronger for her goal, she sets off beyond the town, venturing into the depths of the world...

・Unlock new areas with acquired skills
Skills can be found and learned by exploring the world. In addition to combat skills like attack and healing magic, there are several essential for exploration.

・Enhance your stats by upgrading weapons and armor with materials
Take raw crystal stones obtained across the land to weapon and armor shops for refining into enhancement materials. Strengthening your equipment boosts your stats. You can also use acquired materials to craft powerful weapons and armor.

・Symbol encounters for battles (except in some dungeons)
Encounters with enemies are symbol-based. You can choose to fight or avoid them. Defeating enemies can earn you materials to sell for money, and of course, experience points to level up.

・Finite inventory
Your bag has a limit on how many items it can hold. Decide whether to use or discard materials you find, whether to proceed further or retreat...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.4
  • Storage: 1.2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 1.2 GB available space
